pages.text: This section lists all of the currently obtainable baubles to utilize in Harken Scythe.$(br2)The Reaper's Ring of Silence is the perfect ring to start off with: This will command your weaponry to be silent and not spawn any essences. Perfect for when you need to utilize the reaping tools for combat only!

pages.title: Ring of Silence
pages.text: And the vision that was planted in my brain$(br)Still remains$(br)Within the Ring of Silence

pages.title: Ring of Parasitica
pages.text: The Reaper's Ring of Parasitica gives you a bit of lifesteal thanks to the work of the biomass used to construct it.$(br2)Wearing more than one ring will stack the amount of lifesteal given!

pages.title: Ring of Alteration
pages.text: The Reaper's Ring of Alteration as the name implies, gives you a bit of essence alteration.$(br2)Wearing more than one ring will stack the amount of essence alteration given!

pages.title: Ring of Reversal
pages.text: The Reaper's Ring of Reversal uses the power of both blood and soul to reverse the effects of reaping.$(br2)Reaping for blood essence will give soul essence instead and vice versa.

These trinkets are very popular among Harbingers, as mere contact with essence entities is enough to collect them, while they can store a considerable amount of them.$(br)As these are delicate relics, they cannot be used for direct crucible interactions but rather have their essence transferred by absorbers.$(br2)Essence will also be attracted, making it very useful for quicker essence collecting.
Thanks to an old alliance between the Harbingers and the Withers, it is known that this piece of jewelry can be improved even further.$(br2)The capacity increased is MASSIVE!
